metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6857 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: When resolving a symlink, a race may occur where the buffer passed to`readlink` may actually be smaller than necessary.*This bug only affects Firefox on Unix-based operating systems (Android,Linux, MacOS). Windows is unaffected.* This vulnerability affects FirefoxESR < 115.6, Thunderbird < 115.6, and Firefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
